title: Strengthening Programming Competencies: Delphi-Based Framework for Lifelong Learning in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can explain at least three concepts and characteristics of lifelong learning in nursing.
Students can execute the expert consensus-building process step-by-step using the Delphi research method.
Students can evaluate core competencies of lifelong learners (reflection, questioning, learning opportunity exploration) through real-case analysis.
Students can exchange feedback with learning community members at least twice using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
